name: Espresso
description: A strong, concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink that is composed of double espresso, hot milk, and steamed milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Mocha
description: A coffee drink made with espresso, hot milk, and chocolate syrup.

name: Americano
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and hot water.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice cubes.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: A sweet roll served commonly in Northern Europe and North America.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: A type of semi-sweet cake or quick bread that is baked in portions appropriate for one person.

name: Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky, pastry named for its well-known crescent shape.
